resource: 1001809.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1001809.description=Maximum operation duration of this system is 15 minutes. System may not operate if the traction battery has 50% or less state of charge. Do not initiate Remote Climate with people or pets in the vehicle. Even when the system is in use, the internal temperature may reach a high or low level due to features such as automatic shutoff. Children and pets left inside the vehicle may suffer heatstroke, dehydration or hypothermia, or death or serious injury. See your Owner's Manual for further information. 1001809.derived=false 1001809.vtc=true
